ygData.subject: Re: negativity
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually, I m in a perm group of guys that have known each other for years and years.  I actually work with 4 of them :) My problem is that I can never get him
ygData.messageBody:
Actually, I'm in a perm group of guys that have known each other for years and
years. I actually work with 4 of them :)

My problem is that I can never get him to hotkey a 'I'm gonna mez, stop
singing!" button.

The button he has is, "I have mezzed, don't wake them up!"

That's a WEE bit too late...

But, with enough browbeating over lunch, I'll prevail! I hope...

We have a guild, btw, called Bitter Strength, that only includes our
characters...Say Hi if you're ever on Sol Ro :)

Golias

=====================


know I should remake the thread but... I DON'T WANNA.. I feel better now.

If you are serious Golias the simplest and best answer really is to talk to the
enchanter about it, after all your going to draw most of the attention anway.
However if you really don't feel like talking about it and just want to do it
adjust your song list to take out DDD and do something like CD,Psalm (heat or
cold),Hymn. Ask the Enchanter to mez after the line of wince messages. So far
that's been the only way I've been able to do it. If there is an enchanter I
usually either join the melee or use instruments to buff and heal
